assets

Class Shooter

  • java.lang.Object
    • assets.Sprite
      • assets.Shooter

  • public class Shooter
extends Sprite
    Class used to create shooter character.
    See Also:
    Sprite

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int animationFrame
      Variable for shooterRun to determine which sprite to use.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image> shooterRun
      ArrayList containing all frames of animation for shooter sprites.

      • Fields inherited from class assets.Sprite

        height, image, visible, width, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Shooter(int x, int y)
      Constructor of Shooter class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animationFrame()
      Changes animationFrame variable each frame, based on Game.mainTimer and sets new image using setImage() afterwards.
      private void initShooter()
      Loads images from resources folder and adds them to shooterRun.
      private void setImage()
      Sets image from Array list for each frame based on animationFrame.

      • Methods inherited from class assets.Sprite

        getBounds, getHeight, getImage, getImageDimensions, getWidth, getX, getY, isVisible, loadImage, setVisible
